John, if there’s anything I can do. John just shakes his head. Ed looks at his friend. For th first time, John looks fragile, truly lost. John stares into the middle-distance.

She was drawing angels. John says nothing. The man moves away. But now John sees NOTEPAD next to the phone. He reaches for it. John’s face darkens. It’s not an angel.
